title: First world problem.
body:
Why did the post office have to be closed today?

All I wanted to do was spend a couple hundred on steam sales.

F*ck you Australia Post!

######Note: I use a load and go card to buy things online, hence why I need a post office.

replies.body: Why would I get a credit card when a load and go will work just as well and not put me in debt?

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VOs0NQeh,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-05-02T07:39:47.978+0000)
>
> Why would I get a credit card when a load and go will work just as well and not put me in debt?

A mastercard is not a credit card, it only uses what you have in your bank, google it fam.
Well I have a load and go for that, so why do I need a mastercard?

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VOs0NQeh,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-02T08:00:48.914+0000)
>
> Well I have a load and go for that, so why do I need a mastercard?

SO you dont need to visit the post-office to top it up? Lmao

This, rofl. I know you said 'first world problems' jokingly, but this is literally a non-issue. Just get a MC debit card, it'll save you the trips to the post office and you can buy stuff on steam at 3am if you so please.
But I'm loyal to the post office. I know they're d!cks but I'm loyal. Also, I have the option of loading without leaving the computer but... it's the only exercise I get (Note: I ride my bike).
Get a debit card you large child.
